short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Donate to Charities by Surfing the Web

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ads4Charity is Google Chrome extension that lets people donate money to charities by placing advertisements on websites. The money that companies spend advertising on your computer is donated to a charity of your choice. You can control how many ads are on your computer, where they are, and which websites they're on.
